name: Bo Oelkers
bio: I love swift! I've been an iOS developer since iOS 3 and developing in Swift for over 2 years now at a large iOS company. I love the community surrounding swift, everyone has been so supportive. I'm hoping to help the developers grow and learn somethings myself along the way as well.

name: Sarthak Khillon
bio: Swift is my favorite language! I've been using Swift for 6 years (1 professionally) and it's a joy to read AND write. I'm excited to introduce developers to the language and learn from all of you as well.
